episode_event_fighting_fes/4001_1001_020:
Hey, have you heard? There’s going to be a
tournament for Fighting-type sync pairs on Pasio!
episode_event_fighting_fes/4001_1001_030:
We’re heading out to do some training so we can
join in!
episode_event_fighting_fes/4001_1001_040:
I feel ready for anything! Look, I even got a
new outfit!
episode_event_fighting_fes/4001_1001_050:
And together, Marshadow and I won’t lose
to anyone!
episode_event_fighting_fes/4001_1001_060:
I changed into the uniform I wore when I was
training on the Isle of Armor in Galar!
episode_event_fighting_fes/4001_1001_070: Oh, right. At Master Mustard’s dojo.
episode_event_fighting_fes/4001_1001_080: You know him too, Bea? Is he really strong?
episode_event_fighting_fes/4001_1001_090:
Oh my, yes. After all, he used to be Galar’s
Fighting-type Gym Leader, and he’s a
legendary former Champion as well.
episode_event_fighting_fes/4001_1001_100:
He’s a martial arts master that I hold in the
highest regard.
episode_event_fighting_fes/4001_1001_110:
Wow... Well, if even you think so highly of
him, Bea...
episode_event_fighting_fes/4001_1001_120:
then Gloria must be pretty amazing, too, since she
got personally trained by him!
episode_event_fighting_fes/4001_1001_130: No, no, I’m nowhere near that level...
episode_event_fighting_fes/4001_1001_140: By the way, how do you all usually train?
episode_event_fighting_fes/4001_1001_150:
We had some pretty interesting training methods
at Master Mustard’s place, but I’m curious
about yours!
episode_event_fighting_fes/4001_1001_160:
I suppose I just try to battle against as many
different opponents as I can.
episode_event_fighting_fes/4001_1001_170:
Yup, I also learn from experience! Gotta build up
those muscles by using them, you know?
episode_event_fighting_fes/4001_1001_180: Speaking of which, let’s go and train up!
episode_event_fighting_fes/4201_1001_010:
Tough training won’t get me down when I’m
with you all!
episode_event_fighting_fes/4201_1001_020:
Yeah! Let’s keep pushing ourselves and aiming for
the top!
episode_event_fighting_fes/4002_1001_020: I really worked up a sweat!
episode_event_fighting_fes/4002_1001_030: Oh, are you on your way back from training, too?
episode_event_fighting_fes/4002_1001_040:
Yes! We sparred against each other a bunch
of times!
episode_event_fighting_fes/4002_1001_060:
Yes. Chuck and I have been toughening each
other up.
episode_event_fighting_fes/4002_1001_070: We sparred against one hundred opponents each!
episode_event_fighting_fes/4002_1001_090:
If you’re truly aiming high, you must stretch
yourself beyond your limits.
episode_event_fighting_fes/4002_1001_100:
That was the most exciting and satisfying training
I’ve done in a long time!
episode_event_fighting_fes/4002_1001_110:
Oh dear... Do you suppose we should have
trained more as well?
episode_event_fighting_fes/4002_1001_120: No need to push yourself too hard.
episode_event_fighting_fes/4002_1001_130:
That’s right! What’s important is to keep up your
training at your own pace!
episode_event_fighting_fes/4002_1001_150:
The point of training isn’t to strain or punish
yourself but to improve yourself.
episode_event_fighting_fes/4002_1001_160:
So go ahead and rest up now! You could even
eat some reeeally sweet Rage Candy Bars while
you do!
episode_event_fighting_fes/4002_1001_180: Why don’t you have some with us?
episode_event_fighting_fes/4002_1001_190: Oh, w-we couldn’t impose on you like that...
episode_event_fighting_fes/4002_1001_200:
Don’t worry about it! We’ve got more than enough
to go around, so eat as much as you like!
episode_event_fighting_fes/4002_1001_210:
Bruno and I are both total suckers for these
candy bars!
episode_event_fighting_fes/4002_1001_230:
Wait a second... I think I’ve discovered the true
secret to training!
episode_event_fighting_fes/4002_1001_240:
You’ve just got to eat a lot, move a lot, and sleep
a lot!
episode_event_fighting_fes/4002_1001_250: Hahaha! Now there’s a unique take!
episode_event_fighting_fes/4002_1001_260:
But it definitely shows a true understanding of
martial arts! I’m sure you’ll be very successful!
episode_event_fighting_fes/4002_1001_270: Thank you! I’ll certainly keep trying!
episode_event_fighting_fes/4002_1001_290: Or you might end up like me!
